mapper.sql: select sm.id, sm.sscc_number, sm.batch_nb, str_to_date(sm.expire_date, '%d/%m/%y') as expire_date, sm.material_nb, sm.unit, sm.quantity, sm.from_purchase_order, sm.po_number_item, sm.upload_user, sm.upload_time, sm.update_user, sm.update_time, sm.delete_flag, sm.status, sm.edit_flag, sm.plant_nb from si_material_receive sm
mapper.select: where delete_flag=0 and material_nb = #{materialNb} and batch_nb = #{batchNb}
mapper.update: UPDATE si_material_receive SET plant_nb=#{plantNb}, sscc_number=#{ssccNumber}, material_nb=#{materialNb}, batch_nb=#{batchNb}, supplier_nb=#{supplierNb}, storage_location=#{storageLocation}, expire_date=#{expireDate}, quantity=#{quantity}, unit=#{unit}, from_area=#{fromArea}, from_purchase_order=#{fromPurchaseOrder}, to_picking_area=#{toPickingArea}, po_number_item=#{poNumberItem}, update_user=#{updateUser}, update_time=#{updateTime}, file_id=concat(concat(#{fileId},','),file_id) WHERE sscc_number=#{ssccNumber};
